item.description:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:4, topic:295043”][quote author=Tony da best link=topic=390147.msg2912818#msg2912818 date=1250206060]
Look what i get.

[/quote]

Read and maybe you’ll see…?
“P already defined in handlePacket”
“Package server doesn’t exist”
“Cannot find symbol p2”[/quote]

You see, for him to know what that means, he’d have to have a BRAIN.

Which 85% of people on these forums lack.

item.title: Need Help WIth A Command
item.dc:creator: @Tony_da_best Tony da best
item.description:
@Tony_da_best wrote:

Well i’m trying to make a command that makes everyone do the same emote i got it setup and everything but when i do it, it only makes me do it i hope you help me this is the command.

[code]if (cmd[0].equals(“allpray”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“tony”)) {

                    for(Player p2 : Engine.players) {
                    if (p2 != null) {

                    p.requestGFX(829,1);
                    p.requestAnim(4979,1);
                    }
                    }
                    }[/code]

Read full topic
